page.title: 18Accident!A True Account.
page.content: It was an ordinary Monday after school.I was with my friend Sharon.We were on our way out of Boylands paper shop on Oxbridge Lane to catch the bus which was on the other side of the road. I was silly enough to run across without looking!!A big blue van knocked me down although at the time I did not know what had happened.The driver quickly got out of the van and came over to me.He was very upset and he put his coat over me and told the paper shop to phone for an Ambulance.It quickly came and I went to hospital.They found out I had a broken bone in my back.I suppose that I was lucky not to have been killed.I certainly take much more care whenever I cross any road now - particularly Oxbridge Lane. By Claire Winn (Ox.Lane Pr.Sch.)
